product_name: Charlotte TilburyTravel Size Charlotte's Magic Hydration Revival Cleanser
summary: SummaryCharlotte's Magic Hydration Revival Cleanser deeply cleanses, gently removes makeup, and instantly hydrates without stripping or drying.
details: DetailsBenefits3-in-1 cleanserReduces the look of poresImproves the appearance of tone and texturePlumps skin with hydration that continues post-cleanse, even after rinsingResearch ResultsInstant results: Skin is immediately 2x more hydrated + stays hydrated for up to 24 hours*In just 1 week: Skin feels instantly revived and appears 97% clearer + smoother in 7 days*In just 2 weeks: Skin looks glowing + radiant in 7 days and pores appear reduced by 4x in 14 days**Tested on 33 peopleKey IngredientsHydrating Hyaluronic Acid: Powerful hydration for smoother, plumper looking skinSkin-Smoothing Peptide Complex: Reduces the apperance of pores and refines skin tone appearanceBiomimetic Barrier Shield Technology: Protects and replenishes the skin barrier to prevent water lossItem 2621969How To UseAs a cleanser:Apply a small amount to the palm of the hand.Add a couple of drops of water then gently rub hands together.Apply evenly across the face and massage into skin.Use AM + PM to deeply cleanse, purify and melt away all makeup + impurities.For best results, use Charlotte's Magic Cream or Magic Water Cream after Charlotte's Magic Hydration Revival Cleanser for immediate skin revival and the perfect base for makeup.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Sodium Cocoyl Glycinate, Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Citric Acid, Decyl Glucoside, Glyceryl Stearate Se, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Sodium Benzoate, Glycol Distearate, Pentylene Glycol, Cetyl Hydroxyethylcellulose, Hydrolyzed Cottonseed Protein, Fructose, Sodium Hydroxide, Urea, Parfum (Fragrance), Opuntia Ficus-Indica Stem Extract, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Allantoin, Maltose, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Lactate, Sodium PCA, Trehalose, Sodium Hyaluronate, Phenoxyethanol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Camellia Oleifera (Camellia) Seed Oil, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Disodium EDTA, Potassium Sorbate, Disodium Phosphate, Hydrated Silica, Glucose, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Sodium Phosphate, Plumeria Rubra Flower Extract, Tocopherol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Benzoate.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: As a cleanser:Apply a small amount to the palm of the hand.Add a couple of drops of water then gently rub hands together.Apply evenly across the face and massage into skin.Use AM + PM to deeply cleanse, purify and melt away all makeup + impurities.For best results, use Charlotte's Magic Cream or Magic Water Cream after Charlotte's Magic Hydration Revival Cleanser for immediate skin revival and the perfect base for makeup.
